title: Welcome Home to Quality Living At An Affordable Price. 2 Bedroom!
posting_body: ['Take a Video Tour Today', '> Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!', 'If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.', 'Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.', 'New On-Site Renovation In Progress!', 'Updates & Upgrades Coming Soon.', 'The perfect two or three bedroom floorplan awaits you at Knolls at West Oaks.', 'Our homes feature open living areas connecting to a peaceful private patio.', 'The bedroom comes complete with a large walk-in closet and cozy carpeting.', 'The kitchen includes granite-looking countertops, full appliances, and an abundance of cabinet space.', 'Beside the kitchen, you will also find a laundry closet with hookups for a full-size washer and dryers.', 'Community Amenities Include:', '- 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance Service', '- NEW On-Site Fitness Center with Equipment', '- NEW Designer Hardware & Lighting Package', '- On-Site Renovation In Progress - Upgrades & Updates Coming Soon!', '- Water, Sewer & Trash Removal Services', 'Included', '- NEW Outdoor Playground Area', 'We are a pet friendly community!', 'Dogs & cats welcome!', '*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.', 'Knolls at West Oaks participates in an affordable housing program.', 'Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $37,860 | 2 Occupants: $43,260 | 3', 'Occupants: $48,660 | 4', 'Occupants: $54,060 | 5 Occupants: $58,440 | 6', 'Occupants: $62,760.', 'To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Tuesday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Wednesday:1:00PM-5:00PM', 'Thursday-Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Call today to schedule your tour:', 'show contact info', 'Knolls at West Oaks', '3443 Addicks-Clodine Road', 'Houston, TX, 77082', '<URL>', '*Some Restrictions May Apply.', 'F28j4O3eB']
